articles.description: The footballing gods have had their fun with Scotland again as their Euro dreams die, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Euro 2024: 'Scotland stunned, sickened, suckered and out of Euros'

articles.description: West Indies play South Africa in the Men's T20 World Cup Super 8s - follow text updates and radio commentary.
articles.title: West Indies vs South Africa LIVE: ICC T20 World Cup 2024 - Super 8s cricket score, commentary & updates

articles.description: Furious Scotland head coach Steve Clarke has railed against the decision not to award his side a penalty as they crashed out of Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke furious at penalty decision

articles.description: England bowler Chris Jordan stars on the return to his birthplace Barbados to help his team into the T20 World Cup semi-finals.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: Chris Jordan delivers on Barbados return as England reach semi-finals

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Switzerland vs Germany in the UEFA Euro 2024
articles.title: Switzerland vs Germany: UEFA Euro 2024 - BBC Sport

articles.description: Hungary striker Barnabas Varga is carried off on a stretcher following a mid-air collision with Scotland goalkeeper Angus Gunn.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Hungary's Barnabas Varga carried off on stretcher against Scotland

articles.description: Lando Norris still has hopes of challenging Max Verstappen for the Formula 1 title despite losing out to the Dutchman in the Spanish Grand Prix.
articles.title: Spanish Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris needs to 'put it all together' to beat Max Verstappen

articles.description: England captain Harry Kane says former England internationals who are now pundits should "remember what it’s like to wear the shirt".
articles.title: Euro 2024: Harry Kane says pundits must remember tournaments are 'tough'

articles.description: Albania forward Mirlind Daku has been banned for two matches after leading his country's fans in derogatory chants.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Albania's Mirlind Daku given two-game ban for offensive chants

articles.description: Liverpool great Alan Hansen is discharged from hospital following illness, his former club has announced.
articles.title: Liverpool great Hansen discharged from hospital
